title: After game Lost connection Websites won't load No internet even if there is.
body:
I just realize after playing League of Legends(Game Overview or Stats showing) and open a website, steam or watever needs internet it wont load, Site can't be reach or its telling me I'm not connected to the internet even if I am connected and can still play LOL only LOL. I did all connection thingy(Turn on/off router, check network etc) but still won't work. The only thing that works is restarting my Laptop. 

Thanks!

replies.body: It seems like there could be an issue with your network that is blocking or somehow throttling your connection.  Your troubleshooting so far are great first steps, and I also recommend going over out [Troubleshooting Connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for some additional support.  Please let me know if your issue persists after trying out those steps, and we can look into this some more.

I don't know why it'd do this in the first place, or continue to do so, but I think you should try the release/renew IP and flush DNS step here when it does; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq10
